biotools.summary: MRCIP is a robust Mendelian randomization method accounting for correlated and idiosyncratic pleiotropy. MRCIP is a Mendelian randomization approach for the inference of the causal effect of an exposure on an outcome of interest based on summary-level GWAS data, which accounts for the correlated pleiotropy and the idiosyncratic pleiotropy.
